relation.text: Typed To Lady Wake Clarges Street 15 th . Febry 1785
think you of that sensible amiable Miſs Cooper combating wth . him for 8 or ten Years
never leave her a moment . Miſs Gunning is in great Beauty this Winter
will lay in such a stock now
this Winter -- If our People of ye . Bon-ton go
will be a scarcity of them next Year
never look 'd better than she has done this Winter
